item.description:
Lets all meeet at the Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grill, all newly renovated much bigger and better dance floor and food menu, seperate checks and excellant waitstaff. 
The newest and most exciting sports bar and grill in the Boston area! The atmosphere at the Sports Bar is fun and friendly. Whether you’re looking to watch the latest sporting event on one of there HD televisions (featuring 2 92” projection TVs!) or dance to a local band, you will always have a good time here. They also feature a full dinner menu, pub menu and delicious drinks. If you are new I will make it easy to find our group I will have it reserved under the Meet Up table along with a sign on the table, look forward to all who can join in on the fun, I will get there earlier say 7:30 to get us a table near the dance floor.

Dress code is casual, no cover charge and this group is always a blast to be with!!!!

978-857-6626

 

Band -Lisa Love Experience (Great Tunes)

Time- 9pm

 

WHEN YOU COME IN JUST ASK THE HOSTESS FOR EVA/MEET UP TABLE MY SIGNS WILL BE POSTED!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet you inside Meet up sign at the table closest to the dance floor.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner and Dancing At The Scoreboard
